name: serialampcontroller
description: Control connected Amplifiers with serial interface from Volumio. Currently supports Rotel - A12/A14/A11/RC-1570/RC-1592 >=V1.53/RC-1582 SW V5.xx, Anthem - IDMSTR IA, Meridian - DSP420, Cambridge - CXA61. Other brands can be supported via ampCommands.json.
author: 7h0mas-R

volumio_info.details: Supports control of Amplifiers with Serial Interface from Volumio Interface. Details here: <u>https://community.volumio.org/t/plugin-serialampcontroller-control-amplifiers-with-serial-interface-from-volumio-e-g-rotel-a12-a11-a14/50928</u>
